DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility Criteria Inclusion Criteria To eligible study entry , subject must satisfy main criterion Inclusion criterion : 3.1 Inclusion Criteria - Adult patient ≥ 18 yrs age , < 76 yr age - Admitted MICU ( 3B 3C ) SICU ( 8C , 8D , 11C ) - Surrogate present provide inform consent patient able - RASS score > -3 , < +1 - CAM positive - Enteral access 3.2 Exclusion Criteria : - Recent MI ( within past 2 week ) - High risk dysrhythmias ( i.e . bundle branch block , QT prolongation , class IV HF , implanted device ) - Unable tolerate enteral medication - History stimulant induce mania/psychosis - Pre-existing neurologic disease - Patients transfer outside hospital - Pregnancy - Alcohol withdrawal - History end stage liver disease ( Childs-Pugh class B worse ) - Prognosis consider hopeless ( CMO )
